playmultiplayer: Yes! You can get the tutorial by doing, '!!createserver'
smp: The official QuestCraft Smp is currently down.
modList: You can find the official mod compatibility list at https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/16SopyOPDz3OrL4qcWwMPzL9s_5Uhl5Q-aRIePY6ztSA/edit#gid=0
error401: The error code 401 means that your microsoft account is not old enough. Your account must be 18+ to play. If your account is old enough to play and you are still having this issue, please ask for support for that.
crashworld: You probably turned on clouds, please press custom controls, then start it back up to reset your settings back to no clouds.
realmsjoin: Realms are not supported due to Fabric Loader and MCXR

addserversEmbed.title: How to add servers!
addserversEmbed.description: **Note:** You must own Java Edition to play Questcraft.
fields: Go into Multiplayer and click on add server, add your server then press refresh.

footer.text: Made by WaffleDevs#3065 and Redone by Cart#4891

installQCEmbed.title: How to install QuestCraft!
installQCEmbed.description: **Note:** You must own Minecraft Java Edition.
fields:
Install the apk via [Github](https://github.com/questcraftplusplus/questcraft/releases) or [Sidequest](https://sidequestvr.com/app/7150). 
Sideload the apk via Sidequest or another form of sideloading
Go to unknown sources and click Questcraft, then your done!
If you would rather prefer watching a youtube video, you can do so [here](https://youtu.be/9txMU3r19Pc)

footer.text: Made by WaffleDevs#3065 and Redone by Cart#4891

createServersEmbed.title: How to make servers
createServersEmbed.description: **Note:** You must own Java Edition to play Questcraft.
fields: Use the integrated keyboard to add servers:
Press on add server. Type in the IP. Press refresh and join.
Move the file to the right place:
Copy the servers.dat from your pc to `InternalSharedStorage/Android/Data/net.kdt.pojavlaunch/files/.minecraft` on your quest.

footer.text: Made by WaffleDevs#3065 and Redone by Cart#4891

howModsEmbed.title: How to install Fabric mods for Questcraft
howModsEmbed.description:
**Note:** You must own Java Edition to play Questcraft.
**Note:** It is recommended to have previous modding knowledge before you mod questcraft!
fields: Make sure the mods you are installing are for Fabric 1.18.2 and dont involve rendering too much! **Quilt is unsupported**.

You might want to use the ones that are marked 'Perfect', but be adventurous too. [Official Mod Megalist](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/16SopyOPDz3OrL4qcWwMPzL9s_5Uhl5Q-aRIePY6ztSA/edit#gid=0)./n You can also find mods at [here](https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods?filter-game-version=2020709689%3A7499&filter-sort=4), or any other website that hosts fabric mods.
Move them into the right place:
Copy the `.jar` files to `InternalSharedStorage/Android/Data/net.kdt.pojavlaunch/files/.minecraft/mods` on your quest.
Restart your headset by holding down the power button, and selecting "Restart"

footer.text: Made by WaffleDevs#3065 and Redone by Cart#4891

addResourcePacksEmbed.title: How to install resource packs on Questcraft
addResourcePacksEmbed.description: **Note:** You must own Java Edition to play Questcraft.
fields: Make sure the resource packs you are installing are for at least 1.17 (1.18 native), and doesn't have shaders or need optifine!

You can find some at [resourcepack.net](https://resourcepack.net/) or [Curseforge](https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/texture-packs).
But if you want to get other ones, get them then follow.
Move them into the right place:
Copy the `.zip` or `folder` to `InternalSharedStorage/Android/Data/net.kdt.pojavlaunch/files/.minecraft/resourcepacks` on your quest.
Restart your headset by holding down the power button, and selecting "Restart"

footer.text: Made by WaffleDevs#3065 and Redone by Cart#4891

fixBlackScreenEmbed.title: How to fix a blackscreen/redscreen in Questcraft
fixBlackScreenEmbed.description: **Note:** You must own Java Edition to play Questcraft.
fields:
Your rendering scale must be at 100%
You must have clouds off
If you turned on clouds, press on **Custom Controls** in the launcher./nYou must have ram on 1500 to 2048, sure this might not crash if you go above, but this is a `safe` amount.
If this still doesn't work, please reinstall, if it doesn't come up in unknown sources, please do !!unknownsrcs

footer.text: Made by WaffleDevs#3065 and Redone by Cart#4891

commandsEmbed.title: Help

notshowingupEmbed.title: Not showing up
notshowingupEmbed.description: **App not showning up in unknown sources.**
fields: Check that you have Developer mode on.
In your wanted ADB app (Sidequest or others)
Do **```adb uninstall net.kdt.pojavlaunch```** Then reinstall Questcraft from Sidequest or Github.

footer.text: Made by WaffleDevs#3065 and Redone by Cart#4891
